name: Rainbow Scale
loreDescription: According to legend, a handful of Merpeople have rainbow-colored scales, which possess very powerful healing properties, capable even of bringing back the dead.

skillDescription.base: Increases Effectiveness and Effect Resistance of all allies by 5.0%. Does not stack with same effects.
skillDescription.max: Increases Effectiveness and Effect Resistance of all allies by 10.0%. Does not stack with same effects.
